scenario_text.value: That’s it! Go for it, Syakomon!

I got this! No matter how strong he might be,
I will never let him hurt you, Miu!

Silence! Why must we suffer, just to protect
human children?!
There’s no “must” about it. We want to do it!
Thank you, Syakomon!

Of course I will protect someone so precious
to me! What’s a little pain compared to that?
Syakomon...!

I want to protect Miu and our bond.
I need no other reason!
I believe in Syakomon! She’ll protect me!
That’s it! Go for it, Shellmon!

I got this! No matter how strong our foes may
be, they’ll never lay a finger on Miu!

Silence! Why must we suffer just to protect
human children?!
There’s no “must” about it. I do what I want!
Shellmon...! Thank you so much!

Of course I’d protect the things I care
about! Who cares if I get a scratch or two?
Shellmon...!

I want to protect Miu...and our special bond.
That’s the only reason I need!
I believe in Shellmon! She’ll protect me!
That’s it! Go for it, Mermaimon!

I got this! No matter how strong our foes may
be, they’ll never lay a finger on Miu!

Silence! Why must we suffer just to protect
human children?!
There’s no “must” about it. I do what I want!
Mermaimon...! Thank you so much!

Of course I’d protect the things I care
about! Who cares if I get a scratch or two?
Mermaimon...!

I’d do anything to protect Miu! That’s all
the reason I need!
I believe in Mermaimon! She’ll protect me!

Ha! Then watch me beat the delusion from each
one of your heads!
